Machine Learning FAQs:
======================

Discussion of general ML topics, with links to useful resources.

* Training, validation, test divide

* How does ML work?

* What is a RNN?

* Train loss vs val loss -- overfitting, underfitting, etc

* Batch size?

* Why not just use a large number of layers everytime?

* How should I tackle a huge dataset?

* What is one-hot encoding?

* How should I set up my dataset?

* How can I validate that my network is performing well?
